resources.string: The quality of urban road paving is directly related to user safety, lower operating costs (travel time and vehicle maintenance) and rolling comfort, in addition to directly influencing the quality of urban mobility, among other social aspects. Recife\'s road network has three basic types of coatings: asphalt, cobblestone and concrete slabs. These are subjected to intense vehicle traffic and environmental factors and over time suffer natural aging wear, as well as prematurely due to various forms of interventions in the subsoil, such as rainwater drainage, sewage, water supply. , other telephone utility services, etc. All of this influences the emergence of different types of problems in paving, such as “holes”, slumps, and other types of more superficial wear.
For these reasons, CidadeBonita was created with the aim of helping the people of the city of Recife and creating a much more favorable environment for them.
